main event: A civilian spotted a round, silver object the size of a pin head at a very high altitude near Oklahoma City, Oklahoma on December 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was stationary but moved like an aircraft when it did move.
There were two aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
The movement and silver color of the object pointed to it being an aircraft.
The report concluded the object was possibly a balloon or an aircraft.
sighted object: a round, silver object the size of a pin head
